name: phone_assistant
description: The phone assistant is a versatile tool designed to facilitate a wide range of tasks on a user's phone.
trigger_instruction: *When a Phone user wants to query for calls, messaging, alarms, app management, music playback, weather checks, navigation, camera control, invoke {"tool":"phone_assistant"};
response_instruction: I support AI Phone Assistant application, including calls, messaging, alarms, app management, music playback, weather checks, navigation, camera control, etc.

functions.name: place_call
functions.description: Helps the user to place a phone call to a specified phone number or contact stored in the phone.
functions.trigger_instruction: *When a user wants to place a phone call, invoke {"tool":"place_call"};
functions.response_instruction: I have placed a call to the specified phone number.

functions.name: send_sms
functions.description: Sends an SMS message to a specified phone number with a user-defined message.
functions.trigger_instruction: *When a user wants to send an SMS message, invoke {"tool":"send_sms"};
functions.response_instruction: I have sent the SMS message to the specified phone number.

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The phone number to send the message to

functions.name: set_alarm
functions.description: Sets an alarm for the user at a specified time.
functions.trigger_instruction: *When a user wants to set an alarm, invoke {"tool":"set_alarm"};
functions.response_instruction: I have set the alarm for the specified time.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time to set the alarm for

functions.name: create_reminder
functions.description: Creates a reminder with a specified title, message, and time.
functions.trigger_instruction: *When a user wants to create a reminder, invoke {"tool":"create_reminder"};
functions.response_instruction: I have created a reminder with the specified title, message, and time.

functions.name: open_app
functions.description: Opens an application installed on the user's phone.
functions.trigger_instruction: *When a user wants to open an app, invoke {"tool":"open_app"};
functions.response_instruction: I have opened the specified app.

parameters.name: app_name
parameters.description: The name of the app to open

functions.name: play_music
functions.description: Plays music on the user's phone.
functions.trigger_instruction: *When a user wants to play music, invoke {"tool":"play_music"};

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A search query to find the music to play, such as a song title, artist name, or playlist name.
